revised_title: Magnetostriction of Bismuth Single Crystals: Experimental Investigation and Analysis
tldr: The authors developed a new magnifier to measure the magnetostriction of bismuth single crystals. They discovered that the magnetostriction in bismuth crystals is anisotropic and depends on the direction of the applied magnetic field. This study provides a better understanding of the anomalous behavior of bismuth and contributes to the development of new materials and technologies.
